ops-grillage plotting extension¶

Function to plot model - showing options for nodes, test2

PlotWizard.plot_section(op_gril_obj, list_input, char)¶

Function to plot element groups of model. :param op_gril_obj: an OpsGrillage class object :param list_input: str of element group following definitions in OpsGrillage :param char: str commands for matplotlib :return: plot all element groups with format according to str command parameter
